column1: Local Foods////Anyway - yeah - this sandwich is awesome. The chicken is crunchified somehow
column2: but isn't fried. It's some sort of magical crunchy chicken salad with perfect ranch sauce and toppings that work perfectly together. Then there's the salads - I had the beet and kale ones. Both were awesome And the second best part of the whole meal was the mint-ade in its citrusy
